amendment.description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude the submerged lands of the Outer Continental Shelf from the plan.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exclude the submerged lands of the Outer Continental Shelf from the plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Manning amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 220 (Roll no. 76).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A052) offered by Ms. Manning.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Manning amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 220 (Roll no. 76).
